tool_description: Analyzes transaction data to provide detailed breakdowns and performance metrics by payment method type.

transaction_data_id.description: Reference ID of previously extracted transaction data

group_by_timeframe.description: Time grouping for analysis: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly

include_success_rates.description: Whether to calculate payment success rates

error_messages: Invalid transaction data ID: Provided ID does not reference valid transaction data.
Invalid timeframe: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly].
Insufficient data: Transaction data must contain at least 10 transactions for meaningful analysis.
usage: Provide transaction_data_id from Transaction Data Extractor, optionally specify grouping timeframe and whether to include success rate calculations.

payment_method_breakdown.description: List of payment methods and their usage percentages

success_rates.description: Success rates for each payment method as percentages

average_amounts.description: Average transaction amounts by payment method

trends.description: Analysis of payment method trends over the specified timeframe
